title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Statement Confirming Attendance at COP27
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, on 2 November 2022.
content:
There is no long-term prosperity without action on climate change. There is no energy security without investing in renewables. That is why I will attend [@COP27P](https://twitter.com/COP27P) next week: to deliver on Glasgow’s legacy of building a secure and sustainable future.
